definitions.title: adj.
definitions.body: mocking, only pl. cstr. as noun (si vera l.), [[לַעֲגֵי מָעוֹג]] Ps 35:16 mockers of [[מָעוֹג]] (q.v.), but text dub.; Che reads [[לֽעֲגֵי]] Schwally:ZAW xi. 1890, 258 [[לָֽעֲגוּ]].—To [[[לָעֵג]]] is also reffered [[לַעֲגֵי]] Is 28:11 by Ges De Che Du, < sub [[לַעַג]] q.v.
